text.en: King of scholars, perfectly learned in all five sciences,
text.en-trans: rigpé né nga yongdzok khepé gyal

text.en: Ornament of all siddhas, having perfected generation and completion,
text.en-trans: kyedzok tarchin drubpa kün gyi gyen

text.en: Sun of the doctrine of the Early Translations,
Rongzompa Chökyi Zangpo, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: chö kyi zangpö zhab la solwa deb
